subject: Including the quote on the value of the property ?
msgSnippet: Here s something that I can t get it quite right
messageBody:
Here's something that I can't get it quite right

<antcall target="emit.event" >
<param name="message.text" value=""Isolation level"" />
</antcall>

What's the correct way to include the double quotes in the value so
when the application underneath receives the value it comes
with actually "Isolation level 1" i.e as when you type in the
command line

./emit_event -msg "Isolation level 1"
